info.name: MDN Editor (UI Tweaks)
info.description: tweaks for the UI of the MDN Editor. * the left panel with the `Source` and `Hide` buttons is changed to position sticky to prevent sliding above * the comment section is changed to be more compact and position absolute thus you could fill it while you edit the article * so the useful things are always at hand * source area settings: background color, font color, font family, font size * use the settings menu to change the colors and other on your choice use MDN Editor (Gray Toolbox) if you want to change color of the panels
info.additionalInfo: 0.3.0: - added source area background and font settings 0.2.2: - added greasyfork and openusercss homepages 0.2.1: - fixed the left panel title overlapped the buttons 0.2.0: - converted to usercss - changed name - removed background-color cause of it was included in the MDN Editor (Gray Toolbox) - use it if you want to change color of the panels 0.1.0 - initial version
